name: Give Me Color
description:
GiveMeColor is a videogame made for the 5th One Minute Game Jam, its a singleplayer game where you should paint the as much as you can and avoid the death ballons. There is one easter egg... And to be able to play the game, you just need a computer, a mouse and desire to win.

GiveMeColor developed by:

> Darío Ramón (ioqwert) (My game score 1510 points - 78%)

> Eduardo Ramón (Edurz) (My game score: 1170 points - 81%)

> Jorge Ramón (rzjorge21) (My game score 1240 points - 77%)

Try to beat us, or ... you can't?
